nodes.text: Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012 is a collectors edition of the magazine published by Titan Magazines in November of 2011. It contains collected articles with interviews of cast and crew from the entire Star Wars saga.

These 148 pages are packed with the very best interviews and features from Star Wars Insider, plus some all-new surprises! Discover amazing secrets about the movies! Delve into the Expanded Universe! Go behind the scenes on the groundbreaking series, Star Wars: The Clone Wars! Witness some of the wildest and coolest collectibles!
